lastWeek.Title: 미국 철강관세 50% 유지
lastWeek.Summary: 미국이 여전히 외국산 철강·알루미늄에 최대 50% 관세를 유지하면서, 다만 기업들의 복잡한 신고 부담을 줄이기 위한 집행 방식 조정을 검토 중이라는 발언이 나왔어요. 관세율(50%) 자체는 유지된다는 점에서, 글로벌 철강·알루미늄 가격 상단이 쉽게 낮아지기 어렵고 미국향 완제품·부품 기준으로는 원가가 최소 수% 이상 높은 수준에서 고착될 가능성이 커요. 특히 미국은 한국·EU 등과의 합의 이후에도 일부 기초 소재에는 50% 수준의 고율 관세를 유지하고 있어, 미국 내 조달 또는 미국행 수출 비중이 높은 DA 제품에서는 판재·프레임·모터 등 금속 사용 부품 기준으로 C(+3%) 수준의 구조적 원가 부담이 계속될 수 있어요. 삼성 입장에서는 미국 시장향 세탁기·냉장고·빌트인 제품에서 미국산/제3국산/국내산 소재·부품 조합을 다시 점검하고, 관세 50%가 계속 유지되는 전제하에서 어떤 조달 구조가 총원가 기준으로 가장 유리한지 재계산할 필요가 있어요. 액션: ① 미국 철강·알루미늄 관세 관련 향후 세부 집행지침(예: 품목별 예외, 인증 절차) 모니터링 ② 미국 생산법인/수출법인별로 관세 50% 유지·25% 완화·0% 예외 등 3가지 시나리오 기준 BOM 원가 테이블 업데이트 ③ 2026~2027년 미국향 신규 프로젝트(신모델·신라인업) 기획 시, 관세 50% 장기 지속을 기본 전제로 조달선 다변화·현지 조달 확대 옵션 검토 (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-03-15). 참고: YahooFinance+1, GlobalTradeAlert+1, Wipfli+1, 정책브리프+1
lastWeek.Summary_en: The United States is reportedly considering adjusting its enforcement methods to reduce the burden of complex reporting on companies, while still maintaining tariffs of up to 50% on imported steel and aluminum. Given that the tariff rate itself remains in place, it's unlikely the upper end of global steel and aluminum prices will easily fall, and the cost of finished products and parts destined for the United States is likely to remain at a level that's at least several percentage points higher. In particular, the United States maintains a high tariff rate of around 50% on some basic materials even after agreements with Korea, the EU, and others. Therefore, for DA products with a high proportion of domestic procurement or exports to the United States, a structural cost burden of around C (+3%) could persist for metal components such as plates, frames, and motors. Samsung needs to reexamine the mix of US/third-party/domestic materials and parts for its washing machines, refrigerators, and built-in products destined for the US market, and recalculate which procurement structure is most advantageous in terms of total cost, assuming the 50% tariff remains in place. Actions: ① Monitor future detailed enforcement guidelines (e.g., product-specific exceptions and certification procedures) related to US steel and aluminum tariffs. ② Update BOM cost tables based on three scenarios for US production and export corporations: maintaining 50% tariffs, reducing 25% tariffs, and implementing 0% tariffs. ③ When planning new US-bound projects (new models and new lineups) for 2026-2027, review options to diversify procurement sources and expand local procurement, based on the assumption of a long-term 50% tariff. (Priority: Medium, Deadline: 2026-03-15) References: YahooFinance+1, GlobalTradeAlert+1, Wipfli+1, Policy Brief+1

thisMonth.Title: 미국 한국 관세 재부과 협상 중
thisMonth.Summary: 트럼프 대통령이 한국에 25% 상호관세와 자동차 관세를 재부과하겠다고 밝혔어요. 김정관 산업부 장관이 방미해서 협상했지만 아직 해결이 안 됐대요. 미국이 이미 관보 게재 준비까지 한 상태라고 했어요. 동시에 미국 재무부가 한국을 환율 관찰 대상국으로 재지정했어요 (1월 29일). 삼성 관점: 관세 재부과 시 영향이 클 수 있어요. 특히 생활가전 전자부품(반도체 칩, 모터 등)에 쓰는 중간재 수입가가 올라갈 가능성이 있어요. SEHA 냉장고, 세탁기 같은 대미 수출 제품도 미국 내 원가 상승으로 가격 경쟁력이 약화될 수 있어요. 환율 관찰 대상국 지정은 추후 관세 협상의 지렛대로 쓰일 가능성이 높아요. 액션: ① 트럼프 행정부 관세 발표 일정 모니터링 (매주) ② SEHA 대미 수출 제품별 관세 영향도 시뮬레이션 (기한 2월 10일) ③ 관세 25% 부과 시 원가 상승분 계산 (냉장고·세탁기·에어컨 중심, 기한 2월 14일) ④ 협력사 다원화 및 대체 공급처 검토 (기한 3월 1일) (우선순위: 상, 기한 2월 10일). 참고: 동아일보+1, 미국재무부공시+1, 김정관장관발언+1
thisMonth.Title_en: The U.S. and South Korea are negotiating to reimpose tariffs.
thisMonth.Summary_en: President Trump announced that he would reimpose a 25% reciprocal tariff and automobile tariffs on Korea. Trade Minister Kim Jung-kwan visited the US to negotiate, but no resolution has been reached. The US is reportedly preparing to publish the list in the official gazette. At the same time, the US Treasury Department redesignated Korea as a currency monitoring country (January 29th). Samsung's perspective: The reimposition of tariffs could have significant repercussions. In particular, it could increase the import prices of intermediate goods used in home appliance electronic components (semiconductor chips, motors, etc.). US exports, such as SEHA refrigerators and washing machines, could also see their price competitiveness weakened due to rising US costs. The designation as a currency monitoring country is likely to be used as leverage in future tariff negotiations. Actions: ① Monitor the Trump administration's tariff announcement schedule (weekly). ② Simulate the impact of tariffs on SEHA exports to the US by product (deadline: February 10). ③ Calculate the increased cost of a 25% tariff (focusing on refrigerators, washing machines, and air conditioners, due February 14). ④ Review supplier diversification and alternative suppliers (deadline: March 1). (Priority: High, due February 10). References: Dong-A Ilbo +1, U.S. Treasury Department announcement +1, Minister Kim Jeong-gwan's remarks +1
thisMonth.Tag_en: USA, tariff, 25%, Reimposition, Normally, Exchange rate observation

thisMonth.Title: 한미 관세협상 불확실성 심화, 25% 위협
thisMonth.Summary: 트럼프 대통령이 1월 26일 "한국이 특별법을 입법화하지 않았다"며 관세를 15%에서 25%로 다시 올리겠다고 기습 공표했어요. 작년 7월 협상(상호관세 25%→15%)이 흔들리고 있어요. 이유는 국회가 대미투자특별법 승인을 지연 중이기 때문이에요. 김정관 산업장관이 급히 미국 출장 가서 "투자 의지는 변함없다"고 설득 중인데, 결과는 불확실해요. 삼성 관점: 최악의 경우 관세 10% 추가 인상(15%→25%) → SEHA 자동차 부품·세탁기 모터 등 미국 수출품 원가 급증. 철강·구리 함유도 높은 제품(냉장고, 세탁기) 원가 2~5% 상승 가능. 현재는 15% 유지 가능성이 높지만, 3월 중간선거 전 정치적 압박 가능성 배제 불가. 액션: ① 한미 협상 진전 상황 주간 모니터링 (외교부·산업장관 공개 성명 추적) ② 25% 관세 인상 시 SEHA 제품별 원가 임팩트 정량화 (냉장고, 세탁기, 에어컨 중심) ③ 협력사 가격 협상 기반 구축 (관세 시나리오별 BOM 조정안 작성) (기한 2026-02-20) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-20). 참고: 조선일보+1, SBS+1, MBC+1
thisMonth.Title_en: Uncertainty in Korea-US tariff negotiations deepens, threatening a 25% increase.
thisMonth.Summary_en: On January 26th, President Trump made a surprise announcement that he would raise tariffs from 15% to 25%, claiming that "South Korea has not enacted a special law." The negotiations from July of last year (reciprocal tariffs from 25% to 15%) are faltering because the National Assembly is delaying approval of the Special Act on Investment in the United States. Minister of Trade, Industry and Energy Kim Jeong-gwan is urgently traveling to the United States to reassure the US that "our commitment to investment remains unchanged," but the outcome is uncertain. Samsung's perspective: In the worst-case scenario, an additional 10% tariff increase (from 15% to 25%) would lead to a sharp increase in the cost of US exports, such as SEHA auto parts and washing machine motors. The cost of products with high steel and copper content (refrigerators, washing machines) could rise by 2-5%. While the 15% tariff is likely to remain in place, the possibility of political pressure before the midterm elections in March cannot be ruled out. Actions: ① Weekly monitoring of progress in Korea-US negotiations (tracking public statements from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the Minister of Trade, Industry and Energy); ② Quantifying the cost impact of a 25% tariff increase on each SEHA product (focusing on refrigerators, washing machines, and air conditioners); ③ Establishing a basis for price negotiations with suppliers (preparing a BOM adjustment plan for each tariff scenario); (Deadline: February 20, 2026) (Priority: High; Deadline: February 20, 2026). References: Chosun Ilbo+1, SBS+1, MBC+1
thisMonth.Tag_en: tariff, Korea-US negotiations, 25%, +10%, uncertainty, Trade policy

thisMonth.Title: 미,중국흑연관세 160%
thisMonth.Summary: 미 상무부가 중국산 배터리용 흑연(active anode material)에 대한 최종 AD/CVD 조사에서 관세·관세보조금 합산 부담을 최소 160% 이상으로 크게 올렸어요.globenewswire+3 배터리용 중국산 흑연에만 국한된 조치지만, 유사한 무역구제가 모터·전자부품·철강 등으로 번지면 삼성 DA 수입 원가가 중장기적으로 최대 +1~2%까지 단계적으로 올라갈 수 있는 리스크예요(C기준). 지금 당장은 EV·ESS 쪽 영향이 크지만, 리튬이온 배터리를 쓰는 무선 청소기·로봇청소기·프리미엄 빌트인 제품 쪽 배터리·모듈 단가가 오르면 완제품 원가와 가격 경쟁력에 부담이 될 수 있어요. 액션: ① 3월 예정된 미 ITC 최종 판정 결과 모니터링 ② DA 제품군 중 중국산 배터리·모터 의존도가 높은 BOM 리스트업 및 대체 공급선(미국·한국·제3국) 검토 ③ 2026~2027년 배터리류 중장기 구매계약/헤지 전략에 관세 리스크 반영 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-03-31). 참고: StrategicEnergy+1, ESS뉴스+1, MercomIndia+1
thisMonth.Title_en: US and China impose 160% tariffs on graphite
thisMonth.Summary_en: The U.S. Department of Commerce has significantly increased the combined tariff and tariff subsidy burden to at least 160% in its final AD/CVD investigation into Chinese graphite for batteries (active anode material).globenewswire+3 Although this measure is limited to Chinese graphite for batteries, if similar trade relief spreads to motors, electronic components, steel, etc., there is a risk that Samsung's DA import cost could gradually increase by up to +1~2% in the mid to long term (based on C). The immediate impact is greater for EVs and ESS, but if the unit price of batteries and modules for cordless vacuum cleaners, robot vacuum cleaners, and premium built-in products that use lithium-ion batteries rises, it could put a burden on the cost of finished products and their price competitiveness. Actions: ① Monitor the final US ITC ruling scheduled for March. ② List BOMs for DA products heavily reliant on Chinese batteries and motors and review alternative supply sources (US, Korea, third countries). ③ Incorporate tariff risks into mid- to long-term battery purchase contracts and hedging strategies for 2026-2027 (Priority: High, Deadline: March 31, 2026). References: StrategicEnergy+1, ESSNews+1, MercomIndia+1

thisMonth.Title: 미국 10% 글로벌 관세
thisMonth.Summary: 미 연방대법원이 트럼프 행정부의 비상 관세를 위법이라고 판결하면서 기존 관세는 상당 부분 무효가 됐는데, 트럼프 대통령이 곧바로 전 세계 수입품에 일괄 10% 관세를 매기는 새 조치를 예고했어요cnn+2. 새 10% 글로벌 관세가 실제로 철강·구리·모터·컴프레서 등 가전 관련 부품까지 적용되면, 미국향 DA 완제품 기준으로 관세 부담이 평균 2~3% 정도 늘 수 있어 삼성의 미국 생산·수출 원가 경쟁력이 눈에 띄게 약해질 수 있어요. 삼성 입장에서는 대미 수출·멕시코/중국 생산 후 미국 반입 물량 모두 영향을 받을 수 있어서, 미국 시장 ASP 인상 여력이 크지 않은 제품군은 마진 압박이 바로 커지고, 관세 우회가 가능한 FTA·제3국 생산거점 검토를 서둘러야 해요. 액션: ① USTR·백악관 발표 모니터링해서 실제 관세 대상 품목 코드(HS 코드)·시행 시점 확인 ② 미국 수출 비중이 큰 세탁기·냉장고 등 주요 모델별로 10% 관세 적용 시 P&L 임팩트 시뮬레이션 ③ 멕시코·베트남 등 대체 생산기지별 원가·관세 비교 테이블 업데이트 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-03-05). 참고: CNN+1, Politico+1, Euronews+1
thisMonth.Title_en: US 10% global tariffs
thisMonth.Summary_en: The US Supreme Court ruled that the Trump administration's emergency tariffs were illegal, invalidating most of the existing tariffs. President Trump immediately announced a new measure to impose a 10% tariff on all global imports.cnn+2. If the new 10% global tariff is actually applied to home appliance-related parts such as steel, copper, motors, and compressors, the tariff burden on US-bound DA finished products could increase by an average of 2-3%, which could significantly weaken Samsung's US production and export cost competitiveness. From Samsung's perspective, both exports to the US and the volume of products produced in Mexico/China and then brought into the US could be affected, so product groups that do not have much room to increase ASPs in the US market will immediately face increased margin pressure, and they must quickly review FTAs ​​and third-country production bases that can circumvent tariffs. Actions: ① Monitor USTR and White House announcements to confirm actual tariff target product codes (HS codes) and implementation dates. ② Simulate the P&L impact of a 10% tariff on major models, such as washing machines and refrigerators, that account for a significant portion of US exports. ③ Update a cost and tariff comparison table for alternative production bases, such as Mexico and Vietnam. (Priority: High, Deadline: March 5, 2026). References: CNN+1, Politico+1, Euronews+1
thisMonth.Tag_en: US, tariff, 10%, global, import costs, protectionism, trade

thisMonth.Title: 미국 10~15% 글로벌관세
thisMonth.Summary: 미국이 무역법 122조를 근거로 전 세계 수입품에 임시 10% 글로벌 관세를 부과하는 행정명령을 내렸고, 이후 이를 15%까지 올리겠다는 발언도 나왔어요.reuters+3YouTube​ 가전 완제품과 철강·구리 등 주요 소재가 예외 목록에서 빠질 경우, 삼성 DA의 미국향 완제품·부품 원가는 평균 3~5%까지 뛰고 가격 경쟁력이 크게 약해질 수 있어요. 이번 관세는 150일 한시 조치지만, 이후 품목·국가별 상시 관세(301·232조 등)로 전환될 수 있어 중장기 통상 리스크 관리가 필수예요. 액션: ① 한국·중국·베트남 등 주요 생산 거점의 미국향 물량 비중별 관세 시나리오(10%/15%) 원가 영향 계산 ② 미국 내 현지 생산·조달 비중 확대 및 제3국 우회 조달 가능성 검토 ③ 무역·통상팀과 공동으로 HS코드별 예외 품목 여부 확인 및 업계 협의·대정부 대응안 마련 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-29). 참고: Reuters+2, 한국경제+1, Politico+1, KBS+1reuters+3YouTube​
thisMonth.Title_en: US 10-15% global tariffs
thisMonth.Summary_en: The United States issued an executive order imposing a temporary 10% global tariff on imports from around the world based on Article 122 of the Trade Act, and there were also comments that it would later raise it to 15%. reuters+3YouTube​ If home appliance finished products and major materials such as steel and copper are excluded from the exception list, the cost of Samsung DA's finished products and parts for the US could rise by an average of 3-5%, significantly weakening its price competitiveness. This tariff is a temporary measure for 150 days, but it could later be converted to permanent tariffs by product or country (Articles 301 and 232, etc.), so mid- to long-term trade risk management is essential. Actions: ① Calculate the cost impact of tariff scenarios (10%/15%) based on the proportion of US-bound goods from major production bases, including Korea, China, and Vietnam. ② Review the possibility of expanding local production and procurement in the US and bypassing third-country procurement. ③ Work with the trade and commerce team to determine whether items are exempted by HS code and develop a plan for industry consultation and government response. (Priority: High, Deadline: February 29, 2026). References: Reuters+2, Korea Economic Daily+1, Politico+1, KBS+1, reuters+3, YouTube
thisMonth.Tag_en: U.S., tariffs, 10-15%, global, protectionism, import costs, trade risks

lastMonth.Title: USD/KRW 1,480원 거래 재개
lastMonth.Summary: 원·달러 환율이 1480.4원에 개장한 후 1460원대 후반까지 떨어졌어요. 지난달 24일 이후 17거래일 만에 1480원을 돌파했는데, 트럼프 대통령의 그린란드 관세 위협이 위험 자산 회피를 촉발했기 때문이에요. 이재명 대통령이 "2개월 후 1400원 전후"라고 언급하면서 환율이 하락했지만 여전히 높은 수준이에요. 삼성 관점: 원화 약세 지속 → 수입 원자재(철강, 구리, 냉매) 비용 3.5% 상승 → 협력사 가격 협상 악화. 액션: ① 일일 환율 추이 모니터링 (목표 1,450원 복귀) ② 협력사별 환율 민감도 재분석 ③ 환율 1,450/1,480원 시나리오별 BOM 재계산 (기한 2026-01-24) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-01-23). 참고: 한국은행+1, Reuters+2, 조선비즈+1
lastMonth.Title_en: USD/KRW trading resumed at 1,480 won
lastMonth.Summary_en: The won-dollar exchange rate opened at 1,480.4 won and then fell to the upper 1,460 won range. It broke the 1,480 won mark for the first time in 17 trading days since the 24th of last month, as President Trump's threat of tariffs on Greenland triggered a risk aversion. President Lee Jae-myung's remarks that the exchange rate would reach "around 1,400 won in two months" prompted a decline in the rate, but it remains high. Samsung's perspective: Continued won weakness → 3.5% increase in the cost of imported raw materials (steel, copper, refrigerant) → worsening price negotiations with suppliers. Actions: ① Monitor daily exchange rate trends (return to the target 1,450 won), ② Reanalyze exchange rate sensitivity by supplier, and ③ Recalculate BOMs for each 1,450/1,480 won exchange rate scenario (Deadline: January 24, 2026) (Priority: High, Deadline: January 23, 2026). References: Bank of Korea +1, Reuters +2, Chosun Biz +1
lastMonth.Tag_en: Exchange rate, USD/KRW, 1,480 won, Weak won, +2.3%, risk asset aversion

lastMonth.Title: 원화약세 심화 1,470원 진입
lastMonth.Summary: USD/KRW가 1,470원대에 진입했어요. 월초 1,442원 대비 +2.0% 약세가 진행 중이어요. 금월 최고가는 1,478.78원(1월 20일)을 기록했고요. 삼성 관점: 원화 약세 → 수입 원재료(HRC, 구리, 냉매 등) 비용 상승 → 협력사 가격 협상 악화 우려. SEHA 세탁기·건조기 중심 제품의 구리 집약도 높아서 영향 클 수 있어요. 액션: ① 환율 1,450/1,470/1,500원 시나리오별 BOM 재계산 (기한 2026-01-24) ② 협력사 환율 민감도 분석 강화 (HRC, 구리, 냉매별) ③ 환율 급등 시 비축 전략 검토 (우선순위: 상). (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-01-24). 참고: 한국은행+1, 거래소+1, 우리은행+1
lastMonth.Title_en: The won weakens further, reaching 1,470 won.
lastMonth.Summary_en: The USD/KRW exchange rate has entered the 1,470 won range, declining 2.0% from the beginning of the month at 1,442 won. The highest price this month was 1,478.78 won on January 20th. Samsung's perspective: The weak won → increased costs of imported raw materials (HRC, copper, refrigerants, etc.) → concerns about worsening price negotiations with suppliers. The high copper concentration of SEHA's washing machines and dryers could significantly impact the exchange rate. Actions: ① Recalculate BOMs by exchange rate scenarios of 1,450/1,470/1,500 won (Deadline: January 24, 2026). ② Strengthen exchange rate sensitivity analysis for suppliers (by HRC, copper, and refrigerants). ③ Review stockpiling strategies in case of a sharp exchange rate surge (Priority: High). (Priority: High, Deadline: January 24, 2026). Reference: Bank of Korea +1, Korea Exchange +1, Woori Bank +1

lastMonth.Title: USD/KRW 1,465원대 약세 심화
lastMonth.Summary: 원화가 계속 약해지고 있어요. 1월 초 1,443원에서 1월 20일 1,478원까지 올랐다가 현재 1,465원대에서 움직이는 중이에요. 월간 약 +2.4% 약세 진행 중. 삼성 관점: 이 정도 약세면 수입 원자재(철강, 구리, 냉매 등) 비용이 약 2.4% 올라요. SEHA 세탁기·냉장고 등 부품값 상승으로 협력사 원가 협상 어려울 거예요. 한국은행이 금리를 못 올리고 있어서 원화 약세 방어 여력이 제한적이에요. 액션: ① 환율 모니터링 강화 - 1,480원 돌파 시 긴급 대응 (매일) ② 협력사 환율 민감도 재분석 (철강·구리 중심) ③ 환율 1,450/1,480/1,500원 시나리오별 BOM 재계산 (기한 2026-01-31) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-01-31). 참고: Exchange-rates+1, TradingEconomics+1, 한국은행+1
lastMonth.Title_en: USD/KRW weakens further to 1,465 won
lastMonth.Summary_en: The Korean won continues to weaken. It rose from 1,443 won in early January to 1,478 won on January 20th and is currently trading in the 1,465 won range, declining approximately 2.4% month-on-month. From Samsung's perspective, this level of weakness will lead to a 2.4% increase in the cost of imported raw materials (steel, copper, refrigerants, etc.). The rising cost of components like SEHA washing machines and refrigerators will make cost negotiations with suppliers difficult. The Bank of Korea is unable to raise interest rates, limiting its ability to defend against the weak won. Actions: ① Strengthen exchange rate monitoring - urgent response if the rate exceeds 1,480 won (daily). ② Reanalyze exchange rate sensitivity of suppliers (focused on steel and copper). ③ Recalculate BOMs for each exchange rate scenario: 1,450/1,480/1,500 won (Deadline: 2026-01-31) (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-01-31). Note: Exchange-rates+1, TradingEconomics+1, Bank of Korea+1
lastMonth.Tag_en: Exchange rate, USD/KRW, 1,465 won, Weak, +2.4%, Import price

lastMonth.Title: 美對韓 관세 25% 인상 통보
lastMonth.Summary: 트럼프 행정부가 한국산 제품에 대한 관세를 기존 15%에서 25%로 인상하겠다고 통보하면서, 대미 수출 비중이 있는 국내 제조업 전반에 부담이 커지는 이슈가 나왔어요.chosun+4 구체 대상 품목과 세부 HS 코드는 아직 조정 가능성이 거론되고 있지만, 철강·자동차·기계류 중심의 폭넓은 범위를 겨냥한 것으로 해석되고 있어서, DA 완제품 직접 대상이 아니더라도 부품·소재 단계에서 비용 전이가 올 수 있는 구조예요.chosun+2 삼성 DA 관점에서는 ① 미국향 완제품·모듈·부품 수출분에 직접 관세 전가 가능성 ② 국내 철강·구리 가공업체가 미국향 물량 감소를 만회하기 위해 내수·타 OEM 단가를 인상할 리스크 ③ 향후 세탁기·냉장고 등 소비재까지 관세 범위가 확대될 경우 북미 생산 거점·부품 소싱 구조 재설계 필요성을 같이 봐야 해요.chosun+2 액션: ① USTR·미국 관세 관련 공식 문서에서 HS 코드·품목 리스트 확정 모니터링 ② 철강·모터·콤프레서·전자부품 주요 협력사 대상 ‘대미 수출 비중·관세 영향 설문’ 실시 ③ 미국향 완제품·부품은 중장기적으로 현지/제3국 생산·소싱 전환 시나리오(멕시코·아세안 등) 검토 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-15). 참고: 미국정부발표+1, 동아일보+1, BBC+1, 한국언론+2.
lastMonth.Title_en: US announces 25% tariff increase against Korea
lastMonth.Summary_en: The Trump administration announced that it would raise tariffs on Korean products from 15% to 25%, raising the issue of increasing the burden on the domestic manufacturing industry, which exports a large portion of its products to the US. chosun+4 While the specific target items and detailed HS codes are still being discussed for possible adjustment, they are interpreted as targeting a broad range of products centered on steel, automobiles, and machinery, creating a structure where cost shifts can occur at the parts and materials stage even if the DA is not directly targeted at finished products. chosun+2 From the perspective of Samsung’s DA, ① the possibility of direct tariff shifts on finished products, modules, and parts exports to the US, ② the risk that domestic steel and copper processors will raise prices for domestic and other OEMs to compensate for the decrease in US-bound volume, and ③ the need to redesign North American production bases and parts sourcing structures if the tariff scope is expanded to include consumer goods such as washing machines and refrigerators in the future, must be considered together. chosun+2 Actions: ① Monitoring the finalization of the HS code and product list in official documents related to USTR and US tariffs. ② Targeting major suppliers of steel, motors, compressors, and electronic components for ‘exports to the US’ ③ Conducting a survey on the impact of tariffs and weighting of finished products and components for the US. Considering scenarios for shifting production and sourcing to local/third-country production and sourcing (e.g., Mexico, ASEAN) in the mid- to long-term (Priority: High, Deadline: February 15, 2026). References: US government announcement +1, Dong-A Ilbo +1, BBC +1, Korean media +2.

lastMonth.Title: 트럼프 한국산 관세 25% 재인상
lastMonth.Summary: 트럼프 미국 대통령이 한국산 자동차·목재·의약품 등의 관세를 15%에서 25%로 다시 올리겠다고 26일 SNS에서 발표했어요. 7월 한미 정상 합의(관세 25%→15% 인하)가 최근 한국 국회의 대미투자특별법 비준 지연으로 무산된 거라는 이유예요. 삼성 관점: SEHA 제품군 자체는 직접 영향 적지만, 글로벌 경기 둔화 우려 커요. 무역 분쟁이 심화되면 미국이 철강·구리·화학 부품 관세도 올릴 가능성이 있거든요. 현재 한국 협력사의 부품(냉매 튜브, 압축기 등) 가격이 추가로 1~2% 오를 수 있어요. 하지만 트럼프가 "한국과 해결책을 찾겠다"는 신호를 보냈으니 협상 여지가 있어요. 2월 국회의 대미투자법 통과 시 25%→15% 복귀 가능성도 있죠. 액션: ① USTR 관보 게재일 확인 (25% 발효일 정확히 파악) ② 협력사별 관세 영향도 분석 (냉매·압축기·전기부품 중심) ③ 한국 국회 입법 진도 모니터링 (대미투자법 통과 여부 추적) ④ 통상 협상 전략 수립 (관세 완화 가능성 검토) (우선순위: 중, 기한 2026-02-10). 참고: 조선일보+1, 동아일보+1, KBS뉴스+1
lastMonth.Title_en: Trump raises tariffs on Korean products to 25%
lastMonth.Summary_en: US President Trump announced on social media on the 26th that he would raise tariffs on Korean automobiles, lumber, pharmaceuticals, and other products from 15% to 25%. This is because the July agreement between the US and South Korea (lowering tariffs from 25% to 15%) fell through due to the recent delay in the South Korean National Assembly's ratification of the Special Act on Investment in the US. Samsung's perspective: While the SEHA product line itself has minimal direct impact, concerns about a global economic slowdown are growing. If the trade dispute escalates, the US could also raise tariffs on steel, copper, and chemical components. Currently, the prices of components for Korean suppliers (such as refrigerant tubes and compressors) could rise by an additional 1-2%. However, since Trump has signaled that he will "find a solution with South Korea," there is room for negotiation. If the US Investment Act passes the National Assembly in February, the tariff rate could be reverted from 25% to 15%. Actions: ① Check the date of publication in the USTR Official Gazette (accurately determine the 25% effective date). ② Analyze the tariff impact by partner company (focusing on refrigerants, compressors, and electrical components). ③ Monitor the progress of the Korean National Assembly's legislation (track the passage of the Investment in the United States Act). ④ Develop a trade negotiation strategy (examine the possibility of tariff relief). (Priority: Medium, Deadline: February 10, 2026). References: Chosun Ilbo +1, Dong-A Ilbo +1, KBS News +1

thisWeek.Title: 인도 전국 총파업
thisWeek.Summary: 인도에서 2월 12일 전국 총파업(바라트 반드)이 진행돼 중앙 노총·농민단체가 함께 참여했고, 노조 측은 약 3억 명이 동원됐다고 보고하고 있어요industriall-union+2. 파업은 하루였지만 정부가 노동법·민영화 정책을 물러서지 않으면 추가적인 다일(多日) 파업을 예고하고 있어서, SIEL-P·SIEL-N의 철강·부품 조달과 내륙 운송이 반복적으로 막힐 리스크가 있어요. 삼성 관점에서는 인도 내 철강·플라스틱·전자부품 협력사가 동시에 멈추면 인도 법인 생산뿐 아니라 인도발 부품을 쓰는 베트남·태국 라인까지 동시 차질이 생길 수 있어요. 대응 방향: 인도산 비중이 높은 핵심 자재(철강, 모터, 배선 등)는 최소 2개국 이상 분산 소싱하고, 인도 내 재고 목표일수도 평소보다 여유 있게 가져가는 게 좋아요. 액션: ① SIEL-P/SIEL-N 현지 팀 통해 주요 협력사 가동 현황·추가 파업 계획 업데이트 ② 인도산 비중 높은 자재 리스트업 후 베트남·태국·중국 대체 공급선 단기 확보 가능성 검토 ③ 1일·수일 생산 중단 시 시나리오별 손실·재고 소진 시점 계산 플랜 수립 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-25). 참고: IndustriALL+1, CaliberAz+1, CPIML+1
thisWeek.Summary_en: India saw a nationwide strike (Bharat Bandh) on February 12, with the participation of the Central Trade Union Confederation and farmers' organizations, and the unions reported that about 300 million were mobilized. The strike lasted only one day, but if the government does not back down from its labor laws and privatization policies, it is threatening additional multi-day strikes, so there is a risk that the procurement of steel and parts and inland transportation of SIEL-P and SIEL-N will be repeatedly blocked. From Samsung's perspective, if its steel, plastic, and electronic parts suppliers in India stop at the same time, not only the production at its Indian subsidiary but also its lines in Vietnam and Thailand that use parts from India could be disrupted simultaneously. Response: It is advisable to source core materials (steel, motors, wiring, etc.) with a high proportion of Indian origin from at least two countries, and to have a longer-than-usual inventory target period. Actions: ① Update key partners' operating status and additional strike plans through the SIEL-P/SIEL-N local team. ② List materials with a high proportion of Indian origin and review the possibility of securing short-term alternative supply sources from Vietnam, Thailand, and China. ③ Develop a plan to calculate losses and inventory depletion points for each scenario in case of a one-day or multi-day production interruption. (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-25) References: IndustriALL+1, CaliberAz+1, CPIML+1
thisWeek.Tag_en: India, general strike, labor law, SIEL-P, SIEL-N, nationwide, logistics

thisWeek.Title: 멕시코 전기교통 파업
thisWeek.Summary: 멕시코시티 전기 교통을 운영하는 트롤리버스·경전철 노조(ATM)가 임금·복지·안전장비 부족 문제로 2026년 초부터 반복적으로 파업을 예고했고, 3.5% 임금 인상과 복지 확대가 담긴 잠정 합의를 끌어냈지만 여전히 데드라인을 3월 초로 미루며 압박을 유지하고 있어요labornotes+2. 파업이 실제로 재점화되면 멕시코시티 대중교통이 크게 흔들려서, 인력 이동·내륙 운송 지연을 통해 SEDAM 케레타로 공장의 출퇴근과 부품 이동에 단기 차질이 생길 수 있어요. 삼성 관점에서는 생산지는 케레타로라 직접 타격은 제한적이지만, 수도권 버스·철도·공항 허브가 막히면 북미향 선적 일정이 밀려 완제품 재고와 납기 리스크가 같이 커질 수 있어요. 대응 방향: 멕시코 내 주요 협력사·물류사에 비상 운송 루트(자가 트럭, 다른 버스 노선, 야간 운송 등)를 점검하게 하고, 멕시코시티 경유 인력·부품 의존도를 점차 줄이는 전략이 필요해요. 액션: ① SEDAM 현지 물류 담당자 통해 멕시코시티 경유 루트·리스크 지도 업데이트 ② 북미향 주요 모델의 선적 리드타임·안전재고 기준 재조정 ③ 3월 초 파업 여부에 맞춰 단기 대체 운송·인력 이동 플랜 수립 (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-02-28). 참고: LaborNotes+1, Canal6TV+1, PopularResistance+1
thisWeek.Summary_en: The ATM (Trolleybus and Light Rail Transit Union), which operates Mexico City's electric transit system, has repeatedly threatened a strike since early 2026 over wages, benefits, and safety equipment shortages, and has reached a tentative agreement that includes a 3.5% wage increase and expanded benefits, but is still maintaining pressure by pushing back the deadline to early March. If the strike actually reignites, it could significantly disrupt Mexico City's public transportation system, causing short-term disruptions in commuting and parts movement at the SEDAM Querétaro plant due to delays in personnel movement and inland transportation. From Samsung's perspective, the direct impact is limited because the production site is Querétaro, but if the bus, rail, and airport hubs in the metropolitan area are blocked, shipment schedules to North America could be delayed, increasing finished product inventory and delivery risks. Response: We need to have our major partners and logistics companies in Mexico review emergency transport routes (such as their own trucks, alternative bus routes, and overnight transport), and we need a strategy to gradually reduce our reliance on labor and parts via Mexico City. Actions: ① Update the route and risk map via Mexico City through SEDAM's local logistics representative. ② Re-adjust shipment lead times and safety stock standards for major North American models. ③ Establish a short-term alternative transportation and labor movement plan based on the possibility of a strike in early March. (Priority: Medium, Deadline: 2026-02-28) References: LaborNotes+1, Canal6TV+1, PopularResistance+1
thisWeek.Tag_en: Mexico, strike, trolleybuses, SEDAM, wages, +3.5%, logistics

thisWeek.Title: 인도 총파업 여파·환율
thisWeek.Summary: 인도는 2월 12일 전국 총파업으로 3억 명 이상이 참여해 주요 산업이 하루 멈췄고, 노조 측이 “경고성 파업”이라며 향후 다일 파업으로 확대 가능성도 열어둔 상태예요.industriall-union+1 2월 23일 기준 루피 환율이 달러당 약 90.9루피 수준이고 1년 전보다 약 +4.9% 절하돼 있어서, SIEL-P/SIEL-N 입장에선 철강·구리 등 달러 결제 원자재 수입단가가 연간 기준으로도 꽤 올라 있는 상태예요.tradingeconomics+1 삼성 관점에선 이미 끝난 1일 총파업 자체보다, 앞으로 노동코드 철회 요구가 수용 안 되면 다일 총파업·부문별 파업으로 이어져 현지 철강·물류 라인이 다시 멈출 수 있다는 점이 더 부담이에요.cpiml+1 대응 방향: 철강·부품 조달은 인도 내 단일 소싱 비중 줄이고, 베트남·태국·한국 공급선과 병렬 구조를 만들어서 인도발 파업 때도 2~3주 버틸 수 있는 안전재고·대체조달 체계를 가져가는 게 좋겠어요. 액션: ① [즉시확인] SIEL-P/N 인근 주(타밀나두·UP 등)별 노조 추가 행동 계획·로컬 파업 캘린더 점검 ② [비용계산] USD/INR 1년 기준 +4.9% 절하를 철강·구리·부품별 인건비/원가에 반영해서 인도 공장 판가·물량 계획 업데이트 ③ [대응준비] 인도 철강·물류 파업 시 발동할 베트남·태국 대체조달·선적 플랜 플로우차트로 정리 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-27). 참고: IndustriALL+1, WorkersWorld+1, TradeUnions+1, TradingEconomics+1
thisWeek.Title_en: The aftermath of the Indian general strike and exchange rates
thisWeek.Summary_en: India saw a nationwide general strike on February 12 with over 300 million workers participating, halting major industries for a day. The unions called it a “warning strike” and left open the possibility of it expanding into a multi-day strike in the future. industriall-union+1 As of February 23, the rupee exchange rate was around 90.9 rupees per dollar, depreciating by about +4.9% from a year ago, so from the SIEL-P/SIEL-N perspective, the import price of dollar-denominated raw materials such as steel and copper has risen considerably on an annual basis. tradingeconomics+1 From Samsung’s perspective, the fact that if the demand for the withdrawal of the labor code is not accepted, it could lead to a multi-day general strike and sectoral strikes, which could halt the local steel and logistics lines again, is more important than the already-ended one-day general strike itself. It's a burden. cpiml+1 Response Direction: It would be good to reduce the proportion of single sourcing in India for steel and parts procurement and establish a parallel structure with supply chains in Vietnam, Thailand, and Korea, so that a safety stock and alternative procurement system can last 2-3 weeks even in the event of a strike in India. Actions: ① [Immediate Confirmation] Check additional union action plans and local strike calendars for states near SIEL-P/N (Tamil Nadu, UP, etc.) ② [Cost Calculation] Update Indian factory selling prices and volume plans by reflecting the 4.9% USD/INR depreciation per year in labor costs/costs for steel, copper, and parts ③ [Response Preparation] Organize a flowchart of alternative procurement and shipping plans for Vietnam and Thailand to be activated in the event of a steel and logistics strike in India (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-27). References: IndustriALL+1, WorkersWorld+1, TradeUnions+1, TradingEconomics+1
thisWeek.Tag_en: India, general strike, labor code, rupee, 90.9, SIEL-P, SIEL-N

thisWeek.Title: 베트남 전기요금 구조개편
thisWeek.Summary: 베트남 정부와 EVN이 2026년 1월부터 월 20만kWh 이상 쓰는 대형 공장을 대상으로 2부제 전기요금(용량+사용량)을 단계적으로 적용하는 로드맵을 확정해서 준비하고 있어요vietnam+2. 이 구조가 본격 적용되면 피크시간 최대수요(Pmax)가 큰 SEHC 호치민 공장은 전력 사용 패턴을 안 바꾸면 전기료 원가 부담이 눈에 띄게 커질 수 있어요. 삼성 관점에서는 SEHC가 피크 부하를 낮추면 용량요금 부담을 줄일 수 있지만, 단기적으로는 계약전력 재설정과 설비 가동 스케줄 조정이 필요해요. 대응 방향: SEHC는 공정별 피크 시간대를 재점검해서 야간·비피크로 돌릴 수 있는 공정을 최대한 옮기고, 에너지관리시스템(EMS)과 피크컷 설비 투자 검토해두는 게 좋아요. 액션: ① SEHC 현지 담당자 통해 2부제 요금 시뮬레이션 자료·샘플 고지서 확보 ② 최근 12개월 피크수요(Pmax) 데이터 기반으로 전기료 영향도 산출 ③ 향후 1년 설비 증설·라인 증감 계획과 연계해 계약전력 재설정 시나리오 작성 (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-02-29). 참고: EVN+1, VietnamNews+1, VietnamGovPortal+1
thisWeek.Summary_en: The Vietnamese government and EVN are finalizing and preparing a roadmap to gradually apply a two-part electricity rate (capacity + usage) to large factories that consume more than 200,000 kWh per month, starting in January 2026. Once this structure is fully implemented, the SEHC Ho Chi Minh City plant, which has a high peak hour maximum demand (Pmax), could see a noticeable increase in electricity costs if it does not change its electricity usage pattern. From Samsung's perspective, SEHC can reduce its capacity fee burden by lowering its peak load, but in the short term, it needs to reset its contracted power and adjust its facility operation schedule. Response direction: SEHC should re-examine the peak hours of each process and move as many processes as possible to night and off-peak, and consider investing in an energy management system (EMS) and peak-cut facilities. Actions: ① Obtain two-part rate simulation data and sample bills from local SEHC representatives. ② Calculate the impact on electricity rates based on peak demand (Pmax) data from the past 12 months. ③ Create a scenario for resetting contracted power in line with facility expansion and line reduction plans for the next year. (Priority: Medium, Deadline: 2026-02-29) References: EVN+1, VietnamNews+1, VietnamGovPortal+1
thisWeek.Tag_en: Vietnam, electricity rates, dual-shift system, SEHC, Ho Chi Minh City, power market, peak load

thisWeek.Title: 중국 탄소·전력 규제
thisWeek.Summary: 중국은 15차 5개년(2026~2030) 동안 탄소 이중통제 체계를 도입하고, 배출권거래제(ETS)를 철강·시멘트·알루미늄까지 확대해 전체 배출의 60%+를 시장에 포함시키는 계획을 확정했어요english.www.gov+2. 동시에 2030년까지 전력소비의 약 70%를 시장거래로 돌리고 2035년까지 전국 단일 전력시장을 구축하겠다는 지침이 나와서, 석탄 의존도가 높은 중국 내 철강·레진 협력사는 탄소·전력 비용이 점진적으로 올라갈 가능성이 커요china.org+2. 삼성 관점에서는 중국산 철강·알루미늄·플라스틱 레진 단가가 오르면 SCGE 소주뿐 아니라 한국 광주·베트남 SEHC·폴란드 SEPM 등 중국 소재를 많이 쓰는 법인의 원가 압박이 중기적으로 누적될 수 있어요. 대응 방향: 중국발 원자재 비중이 큰 품목은 동남아·인도·중동 대체선을 미리 검토하고, 고탄소 소재는 재활용·저탄소 등급 전환 가능성을 협력사와 함께 검토하는 게 좋아요. 액션: ① SCGE 협력사별 전력비·탄소비용 비중 파악 및 향후 2~3년 예상 인상 시나리오 취합 ② 중국산 비중 높은 자재의 대체 소싱·로컬라이징 시나리오 작성 ③ 2026~2030년 중국 탄소·전력 정책 변화에 따른 원가 밴드(상·중·하) 설정 후 DA 주요 모델별 민감도 분석 (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-03-10). 참고: ChinaGov+1, Reuters+1, ArgusMedia+1
thisWeek.Summary_en: China has finalized a plan to introduce a dual carbon control system during the 15th Five-Year Plan (2026-2030) and expand the Emissions Trading System (ETS) to include steel, cement, and aluminum, thereby including 60%+ of total emissions in the market.english.www.gov+2. At the same time, with the directive to shift about 70% of electricity consumption to market transactions by 2030 and establish a national single electricity market by 2035, there is a high possibility that carbon and electricity costs will gradually rise for Chinese steel and resin partners that are highly dependent on coal.china.org+2. From Samsung's perspective, if the unit price of Chinese steel, aluminum, and plastic resin rises, cost pressures may accumulate in the medium term not only for SCGE Suzhou but also for corporations that use a lot of Chinese materials, such as Gwangju in Korea, SEHC in Vietnam, and SEPM in Poland. Response direction: For items with a high proportion of raw materials from China, it would be good to review alternative routes from Southeast Asia, India, and the Middle East in advance, and for high-carbon materials, it would be good to review with partners the possibility of recycling and converting to low-carbon grades. Actions: ① Identify the proportion of electricity and carbon costs for each SCGE partner and compile scenarios for projected increases over the next 2-3 years. ② Develop alternative sourcing and localization scenarios for materials with a high proportion of Chinese origin. ③ Establish cost bands (upper, middle, and lower) based on changes in China's carbon and electricity policies from 2026 to 2030, and conduct a sensitivity analysis for each major DA model. (Priority: Medium, Deadline: 2026-03-10) References: ChinaGov+1, Reuters+1, ArgusMedia+1
thisWeek.Tag_en: China, carbon regulations, electricity market, SCGE, steel, resin, energy

lastWeek.Title: 인도총파업여파
lastWeek.Summary: 인도에서 2026-02-12 전국 단위 총파업이 진행됐고, 일부 지역은 항만·물류·산업단지 쪽에서 차량/인력 이슈로 물동 지연 얘기가 나와요. 특히 타밀나두 쪽 산업벨트는 운송차량 부족/게이트 미팅으로 출하가 꼬일 수 있어요. SIEL-P(첸나이)는 부품 반입·완제품 출하가 단기 지연되면 라인 리듬이 깨질 수 있어서, 최소 1~2일 단위 변동을 리스크로 잡아두는 게 좋아요. 대응 방향: 파업/시위성 집회는 “가격”보다 “리드타임”이 터져서 더 아파요 → 핵심 부품(모터·컴프레서·판금) 위주로 안전재고/대체운송을 먼저 잡아야 해요. 액션: ① [즉시 확인] SIEL-P 물류사(트럭킹/항만) 지연 여부·대체루트 확인 ② [비용 계산] 안전재고 +3~5일 상향 시 재고비용 vs 라인스톱 비용 비교 ③ [대응 준비] 파업 재발 시 출하 우선순위(고마진/긴급오더) 룰 확정 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-17). 참고: EconomicTimes+1, WSWS+1, HRKatha+1
lastWeek.Title_en: Aftermath of the Indian general strike
lastWeek.Summary_en: India saw a nationwide general strike on February 12, 2026, and some regions are experiencing delays in freight transport due to vehicle/manpower issues in ports, logistics, and industrial complexes. In particular, the Tamil Nadu industrial belt may see shipments disrupted due to a shortage of transportation vehicles/gate meetings. SIEL-P (Chennai) has a short-term delay in the import of parts and shipment of finished products, which can disrupt the line rhythm, so it is best to consider fluctuations of at least 1-2 days as a risk. Response: Strikes/protests are more painful because they affect “lead time” rather than “price” → Safety stock/alternative transportation should be secured first, focusing on core parts (motors, compressors, sheet metal). Actions: ① [Immediate Confirmation] Confirm delays and alternative routes with SIEL-P logistics companies (trucking/ports). ② [Cost Calculation] Compare inventory costs vs. line stop costs when safety stock is increased by 3-5 days. ③ [Response Preparation] Confirm shipping priority (high-margin/urgent orders) rules in the event of a strike (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-17). References: EconomicTimes+1, WSWS+1, HRKatha+1

lastWeek.Title: 인도 총파업 공급차질
lastWeek.Summary: 인도에서 10개 노총 주도 2월12일 24시간 전국 총파업(Bharat Bandh)이 벌어졌어요. 3억명 규모로 교통·항만·제조업이 멈추면서 물류 대혼란이 일어났대요.SIEL-P/SIEL-N 공장의 철강·플라스틱 공급사와 항만 통관이 직격탄 맞아, 납기 2~3일 지연될 위험이 커요. 원가 영향은 운송비 상승으로 0.2~0.3% 수준 추정돼요. 대응 방향: 인도 내 안전재고 0.5주 상향, 베트남·태국 공급선 다변화 가속. 액션: ① SIEL 현지 담당자 파업 후 영향 확인 (기한 2026-02-17) ② 철강·플라스틱 비축 재검토 (기한 2026-02-20) ③ 대체 공급선 견적 확보 (기한 2026-03-01) (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-17) 참고: EconomicTimes+1,TimesofIndia+1,Reuters+1
lastWeek.Summary_en: India launched a 24-hour nationwide strike (Bharat Bandh) on February 12th, led by 10 trade union confederations. Transportation, ports, and manufacturing, affecting 300 million people, halted operations, causing logistical chaos. The SIEL-P/SIEL-N plant's steel and plastic suppliers and port customs clearance were hit hard, increasing the risk of delivery delays of 2-3 days. The cost impact is estimated at 0.2-0.3% due to increased transportation costs. Response: Increase safety stock in India by 0.5 weeks and accelerate diversification of supply lines to Vietnam and Thailand. Actions: ① Assess the impact of the SIEL local strike (Deadline: February 17, 2026) ② Review steel and plastic stockpiles (Deadline: February 20, 2026) ③ Secure quotes from alternative suppliers (Deadline: March 1, 2026) (Priority: High, Deadline: February 17, 2026) References: EconomicTimes+1, TimesofIndia+1, Reuters+1

lastWeek.Title: 인도 2월 총파업 여파
lastWeek.Summary: 인도에서 2월 12일 전국 총파업이 열리면서 전력·운송·은행 등 핵심 서비스가 하루 동안 크게 멈췄어요. SIEL-P 첸나이와 SIEL-N 노이다 공장은 부품 물류 지연과 인력 결근으로 최대 1일분 생산 차질이 발생했거나, 유사 규모 파업이 반복되면 월 기준 생산량의 약 3~5%까지 영향을 줄 수 있어요. 삼성 관점에선 약 3억 명이 참여한 이번 파업으로 올해 내 추가 총파업·부분 파업 리스크가 커져, 인도 내 생산 계획과 선적 일정에 상시 버퍼가 필요해졌어요. 대응 방향: 인도 내 핵심 Steel/Plastic/전자부품은 현지 재고일수를 기존 대비 +3~5일 상향하고, 동일 스펙 품목은 베트남·태국 공급선과 병행 운용하는 구조로 전환하는 게 좋아요. 액션: ① SIEL-P/SIEL-N 현지팀과 2월 총파업 기간 설비 가동률·결근률 데이터 수집 ② 인도발 핵심 소재·부품 안전재고 목표 상향 및 재고자산 부담 시나리오 계산 ③ 2026년 상반기 내 인도-동남아 대체 공급선 후보 리스트 업데이트 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-20). 참고: 인도현지언론+2, 노동단체공시+1
lastWeek.Title_en: The aftermath of India's February general strike
lastWeek.Summary_en: India saw a nationwide general strike on February 12, significantly disrupting key services such as power, transportation, and banking for a day. SIEL-P Chennai and SIEL-N Noida factories experienced production disruptions of up to one day due to delays in parts logistics and absenteeism, and repeated strikes of similar scale could impact approximately 3-5% of monthly production. From Samsung's perspective, this strike, involving approximately 300 million workers, has increased the risk of additional general and partial strikes this year, requiring a permanent buffer in production plans and shipping schedules in India. Response: It would be better to increase the local inventory days for core steel/plastic/electronic components in India by 3-5 days compared to the existing ones, and to switch to a structure in which items with the same specifications are operated in parallel with supply lines from Vietnam and Thailand. Actions: ① Collect data on facility utilization and absenteeism during the February general strike with the SIEL-P/SIEL-N local team. ② Raise safety stock targets for key materials and components from India and calculate inventory burden scenarios. ③ Update the list of alternative supply sources between India and Southeast Asia by the first half of 2026 (Priority: High, Deadline: February 20, 2026). References: Indian local media +2, labor organization disclosure +1

lastWeek.Title: 인도 2월 총파업
lastWeek.Summary: 인도에서 2월 12일에만 약 3억명이 참여한 전국 총파업이 벌어졌고, 노동조합들은 정부의 노동법(4개 노동코드) 철회를 요구하면서 추가 행동도 예고하고 있어. 이번 총파업으로 일부 산업벨트와 공공부문이 하루 멈췄고, 같은 스케일의 행동이 반복되면 SIEL-P·SIEL-N 주변 철강·물류·부품 협력사 가동과 출퇴근 교통이 1~2일씩 끊기는 시나리오도 충분히 상정해야 해. 삼성 입장에선 이번 파업 당시 공장 출근률·라인 가동 영향이 크진 않았는지 먼저 복기하고, 앞으로 분기당 1회 수준의 전국 행동이 온다고 가정해 재고 커버 일수와 현지 대체 운송망을 점검해 두는 게 좋아. 액션: ① 2월 12일 SIEL-P/N 출근·생산 실적 리뷰해서 실제 영향도 정리 [즉시 확인] ② 전국 총파업 1~2일 발생 시 철강·물류 핵심 협력사별 대응계획·안전재고 수준 재점검 [비용 계산] ③ 인도 노총·정부의 노동코드 시행 로드맵 모니터링 체계 구축 및 분기 리포트화 [대응 준비] (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-22). 참고: IndustriALL+1, 인도노총+2
lastWeek.Summary_en: In India, a nationwide general strike took place on February 12th alone, with approximately 300 million workers participating, and labor unions are threatening additional actions, demanding the government's withdrawal of labor laws (four labor codes). This general strike brought some industrial belts and the public sector to a halt for a day, and if actions of the same scale are repeated, we must fully consider a scenario where operations at steel, logistics, and parts subcontractors around SIEL-P·SIEL-N and commuting traffic will be disrupted for 1-2 days. From Samsung's perspective, it would be good to first review whether the impact on factory attendance and production line operation was significant at the time of this strike, and to check the number of days to cover inventory and local alternative transportation networks assuming that there will be nationwide actions once per quarter in the future. Actions: ① Review SIEL-P/N attendance and production performance on February 12th and organize the actual impact [Immediate confirmation] ② Re-examine response plans and safety stock levels for each key steel and logistics partner in the event of a 1-2 day nationwide general strike [Calculate costs] ③ Establish a monitoring system and quarterly report on the labor code implementation roadmap of the Indian Trade Union Congress (ITU) and the government [Prepare for response] (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-22). Reference: IndustriALL+1, ITU+2

lastWeek.Title: 인도2월총파업리스크
lastWeek.Summary: 인도에서 2월 12일에 전국 총파업이 진행돼서 노동자 최대 3억명이 참여했고, 운송·금융·제조 전반이 하루 이상 크게 멈췄어요.industriall-union+1 이 여파로 SIEL-P랑 SIEL-N 공장도 물류·부품 입고가 지연될 수 있고, 추가 파업이 이어지면 1주일 기준 라인 가동 일부가 빠지는 생산 차질 구조예요. 인도 생산 거점은 인도 내 철강·부품 의존도가 높아서, 단기적으로는 안전재고 확대로 대응하고 중기적으로는 베트남·태국 공급선 비중을 키워서 리스크를 나눌 필요가 있어요. 액션: ① SIEL-P/N 현지 노무팀 통해 3~4월 추가 파업·시위 계획 여부 확인 ② 인도 내 주요 철강·부품 협력사의 재고일수·리드타임 재점검 ③ 베트남·태국 대체 공급선 후보 리스트업 및 견적·리드타임 수집 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-26). 참고: 인도경제지+1, 국제노동단체+2industriall-union+2
lastWeek.Summary_en: In India, a nationwide general strike took place on February 12th, with up to 300 million workers participating, and transportation, finance, and manufacturing came to a standstill for more than a day. Industriall-union+1 As a result, logistics and parts delivery may be delayed at the SIEL-P and SIEL-N factories, and if additional strikes continue, production will be disrupted with some line operations being suspended for a week. Since the Indian production base is highly dependent on domestic steel and parts, it is necessary to respond by increasing safety stock in the short term and to share risks by increasing the proportion of supply lines from Vietnam and Thailand in the medium term. Action: ① Confirm with the local labor team of SIEL-P/N whether additional strikes or protests are planned for March or April. ② Re-examine the inventory days and lead times of major steel and parts suppliers in India. ③ List alternative suppliers from Vietnam and Thailand and collect quotes and lead times. (Priority: High, Deadline: February 26, 2026). Reference: The Indian Economic Daily +1, International Labor Organization +2, Industry-Union +2

SIEL-P(첸나이) SIEL-N(노이다) 공장의 철강 공급사 70%가 인도산에 의존 → 생산 차질 2~3주 우려돼요. 특히 냉장고·세탁기 BOM에서 철강 원가 5~7% 상승 가능. 대응: SIEL-P SIEL-N 현지 담당자와 파업 일정 및 비축 전략 긴급 협의 필수. 베트남·태국 철강사 대체 공급선 긴급 확보 검토. 액션: ① SIEL-P/N 현지 담당자 파업 영향도 확인 ② 철강 협력사별 재고 현황 재검토 및 안전재고 +10% 증가 조치 ③ 베트남(SEHC)·태국(TSE) 철강사 긴급 협상 일정 설정 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-05). 참고: 인도현지언론+2, Reuters+1
thisMonth.Title_en: India's nationwide trade union strike on February 12th
thisMonth.Summary_en: The Indian Steel Workers' Union (RINL) and the National Union of Trade Unions (NUTU) officially announced a large-scale strike on February 12th. Their key demands include wage increases and opposition to asset privatization. 70% of steel suppliers at the SIEL-P (Chennai) and SIEL-N (Noida) plants rely on Indian steel, raising concerns about production disruptions of 2-3 weeks. Steel costs, particularly in refrigerator and washing machine bills of materials, could rise by 5-7%. Response: Urgent consultations with local SIEL-P and SIEL-N representatives regarding strike schedules and stockpiling strategies are essential. Urgent consideration should be given to securing alternative suppliers from Vietnamese and Thai steel companies. Actions: ① Verify the impact of the strike on local SIEL-P and N representatives. ② Review inventory status at each steel partner and increase safety stocks by 10%. ③ Set a date for urgent negotiations with Vietnamese (SEHC) and Thai (TSE) steel companies (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-05). Reference: Indian local media +2, Reuters +1

thisMonth.Title_en: Indian steel strike scheduled for February 12
thisMonth.Summary_en: The Indian Steel Workers' Union (RINL) and the National Trade Union Federation officially announced a strike on February 12 (announced from January 22 to 26, 2026). They demand a 15% wage increase and oppose labor law revisions. More than 70% of steel suppliers to the SIEL-P (Chennai) and SIEL-N (Noida) plants rely on Indian steel, raising concerns of supply disruptions lasting 2-3 weeks. Samsung's perspective: Production disruptions in refrigerators, washing machines, and air conditioners are possible. At the same time, a 15% increase in Indian steel import prices is also expected. Actions: ① Confirm the strike schedule and impact with local SIEL-P and SIEL-N officials. ② Review stockpiles and increase safety stocks at each steel supplier. ③ Set a date for emergency negotiations with Vietnamese and Thai steelmakers (deadline: February 5, 2026) (Priority: High, Deadline: February 2, 2026). References: Indian local media +2, Reuters +1, SteelOrbis +1

thisMonth.Title_en: Nationwide strike planned in India
thisMonth.Summary_en: The Central Confederation of Trade Unions of India has officially announced a nationwide strike on February 12th, demanding wage increases and the repeal of labor laws. More than 70% of key suppliers at the SIEL-P (Chennai) and SIEL-N (Noida) plants rely on Indian steel and parts suppliers, raising concerns of supply disruptions lasting 2-3 weeks. Samsung's perspective: This directly impacts the production of refrigerators, washing machines, air conditioners, and microwave ovens, and a 15% increase in Indian steel prices is also expected. Response: SIEL-P/N is currently discussing strike-prepared stockpiling plans with its suppliers. Simultaneously, securing urgent supply lines from Vietnam and Thailand and increasing safety stocks are essential. Actions: ① Confirm the strike schedule and impact with local SIEL-P/N officials (deadline: February 4, 2026); ② Review stockpiling by steel suppliers and negotiate expedited delivery of February deliveries; and ③ Set a schedule for emergency negotiations with Vietnamese and Thai steel suppliers (deadline: February 5, 2026). (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-04)

thisMonth.Title: 인도 2월 총파업 예고
thisMonth.Summary:
인도에서는 중앙 노총과 여러 부문 노조가 2월 12일에 새 노동코드·SHANTI법·연금·임금 이슈에 반대하는 전국 총파업을 예고했고, 은행·전력·공공부문까지 동참하면서 이번 파업이 상당히 크게 번질 조짐이에요.

최근 기사 기준으로 정부기관·은행·전력노조까지 참여 의사를 밝힌 상태라, 노이다·첸나이 인근 공단에서도 도로 봉쇄(rasta roko)와 공장 출입 제약이 커질 수 있어요. SIEL-P/SIEL-N 공장은 현지 강판·부품 조달과 인력 출근 차질이 동시에 발생하면 1~2일 생산 중단, 길게는 1주일 이상 생산차질 가능성도 있어서, 2월 둘째 주 안전재고와 대체 조업(주말근무) 계획을 선제적으로 짜야 해요.

대응: 2월 초까지 ① 주요 철강·부품 협력사의 조업 계획과 재고 수준을 확인하고, ② 한국·베트남·태국발 완제품/반제품 리디플로우(서로 물량 보완) 시나리오를 준비하는 게 안전해요.

액션: ① SIEL-P/N 현지 HR·생산팀과 2월 12일 파업 당일 교대조 운영, 출근 버스 등 대책 협의 (기한 2026-02-08) ② 주력 모델별 완제품 및 핵심 부품 안전재고를 최소 1주일 수준으로 상향 (기한 2026-02-10) ③ 인도발 공급차질 시 한국·베트남·태국 공장 증산 여력 및 물류 리드타임 점검 (기한 2026-02-15) (우선순위: 상). 참고: CTU공동성명+1, Newsclick+1, TimesOfIndia+1 citucentre+2
thisMonth.Title_en: India announces general strike in February
thisMonth.Summary_en:
In India, the Central Trade Union Confederation and various sectoral unions have announced a nationwide strike on February 12th to protest the new labor code, the Shanti Act, pensions, and wages. With banks, power companies, and the public sector joining in, the strike is expected to become quite widespread.

As of recent reports, government agencies, banks, and power companies have announced their intention to participate, which could lead to increased road blockades (rasta roko) and restrictions on factory access in industrial complexes near Noida and Chennai. The SIEL-P/SIEL-N plants face production disruptions of one to two days, and even up to a week, if local steel sheet and parts procurement and workforce attendance are disrupted simultaneously. Therefore, they must proactively develop safety stocks and alternative operations (weekend work) plans for the second week of February.

Response: By early February, it is safest to: ① Confirm the operation plans and inventory levels of major steel and parts suppliers, and ② Prepare a scenario for redistribution (mutual supply supplementation) of finished and semi-finished products from Korea, Vietnam, and Thailand.

Action: ① Discuss countermeasures with the local HR and production teams of SIEL-P/N, including shift operation and commuter buses on the day of the February 12 strike (Deadline: February 8, 2026). ② Increase safety stocks of finished products and key parts for major models to at least one week's worth (Deadline: February 10, 2026). ③ Review production capacity and logistics lead times at factories in Korea, Vietnam, and Thailand in the event of supply disruptions from India (Deadline: February 15, 2026). (Priority: High). References: CTU Joint Statement +1, Newsclick +1, TimesOfIndia +1, citucentre +2

lastMonth.Title_en: India's nationwide strike on February 12 (final confirmation)
lastMonth.Summary_en: The Central Trade Union (CTU) of India officially finalized a strike date for February 12th at its national meeting on January 9th. The strike targets the steel, electricity, and transportation sectors. The strike is protesting the government's formalization of the enforcement regulations for the four major labor laws (enacted in 2020). The union demands: opposition to the abolition of regular employment, strengthening union registration, and a 15% wage increase. More than 70% of steel suppliers for SIEL-P's Chennai and SIEL-N's Noida plants rely on Indian steel, raising concerns about supply disruptions of 2-3 weeks. At the same time, Indian steel prices are expected to rise by 15%, directly impacting refrigerator, washing machine, and air conditioner production. Response: Real-time monitoring of the strike's scale and schedule with local officials. Consultation with steel suppliers on stockpiling plans is also underway. Urgent security of supply lines in Vietnam and Thailand is also expected. Actions: ① Local SIEL-P/N officials will conduct daily strike status checks (deadline: January 23, 2026). ② Re-examination of stockpiling levels by steel partner companies. ③ Initiation of emergency negotiations with Vietnamese and Thai steel companies. (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-01-23) References: Indian trade unions +3, news media +2, international organizations +1

thisWeek.Summary_en: At its Chinese production base, LG is pushing forward with a ‘core component breakthrough project’ to locally source steel sheets and resins for washing machines and refrigerators instead of importing them from Korea.co​ The home appliance division recently achieved quarterly sales of approximately 8.6 trillion won and an operating profit margin of 10.9%, and it was mentioned that localization of raw material procurement and design and line efficiency were the key factors.co+1 If Chinese raw materials are locally sourced, Samsung will have more leeway in logistics and material unit costs than us based on the same BOM, which could increase the burden on Samsung in the price competition for refrigerators and washing machines in China and around the world. From a benchmarking perspective, we also need to re-examine the local procurement rate and quality level of large materials such as steel sheets, resins, motors, and compressors, focusing on our Chinese and Vietnamese subsidiaries, and consider reducing costs by bundling design lightweighting and line automation as a package, like LG.lg+1 Actions: ① Update a comparative report on the procurement sources, unit prices, and logistics costs of key raw materials (steel sheets, resins, etc.) for each Chinese and Vietnamese home appliance factory. ② Screen Chinese local steel and resin suppliers that overlap with LG suppliers and benchmark their quality and price. ③ Establish a "Core Components Cost Innovation" task force to develop cost improvement scenarios for washing machine motors and compressors. (Priority: High, Deadline: February 29, 2026). References: Maeil Business Newspaper +1, LG Performance Disclosure +1, LGSustainability +1

thisWeek.Title: Whirlpool 원가절감
thisWeek.Summary: Whirlpool이 한 핵심 부품 공급업체 차질로 분기 생산량이 5% 줄고, 순매출이 15.3% 감소하면서 1억달러 수준 이익이 날아간 사례를 공개했어요.supplychaindive​ 이 사건 이후 부품 종류를 11만 개→7만 개로 줄이고 전략 부품 위주로 듀얼 소싱을 확대하면서, 연간 8~9억달러 비용 절감과 그 중 4억달러 수준의 원자재 비용 인하, 공급망 프리미엄 비용·비효율 제거 2.5억달러+를 목표로 제시했어요.supplychaindive​ 원자재·공급망 쪽에서 이렇게 공격적인 절감이 들어가면 북미 냉장고·세탁기에서 삼성 대비 원가·마진 여유가 더 벌어질 수 있어서, 우리도 북미 조달 구조와 긴급 물류·프리미엄 비용 라인을 정교하게 다시 보는 게 필요해 보여요. 벤치마크 측면에선 Whirlpool처럼 고부가 전략 부품 위주로만 듀얼 소싱을 강화하고, 저가 단일 소싱 품목은 단계적으로 대체·표준화하는 구조를 검토해볼 만해요. 액션: ① 북미 냉장고·세탁기/건조기 기준 Whirlpool 원자재 비용 절감 타깃(8~9억달러)과 삼성 원가개선 계획 비교 ② 멕시코·미국 생산거점의 프리미엄 물류비·긴급 조달비 항목 세부 분석 ③ 북미용 철강·레진·전자부품에서 듀얼 소싱 확대 후보군(현지/역내 공급사) 리스트업 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-03-15). 참고: SupplyChainDive+1, Whirlpool실적공시+1, Zacks+1
thisWeek.Summary_en: Whirlpool disclosed a case in which its quarterly production decreased by 5% and its net sales decreased by 15.3% due to disruptions in a key parts supplier, resulting in a loss of $100 million in profits. supplychaindive​ After this incident, it reduced the number of parts from 110,000 to 70,000 and expanded dual sourcing focusing on strategic parts, and set a goal of reducing annual costs by $800 million to $900 million, including a reduction in raw material costs by $400 million and eliminating premium costs and inefficiencies in the supply chain by $250 million+. supplychaindive​ Such aggressive reductions in raw materials and the supply chain could further widen the cost and margin margin compared to Samsung in North American refrigerators and washing machines, so it seems necessary for us to carefully reexamine our North American procurement structure and emergency logistics and premium cost lines. Benchmark From a side perspective, it's worth considering a structure like Whirlpool's, where dual sourcing is focused on high-value-added strategic components only, while gradual replacement and standardization of low-cost single-sourced items. Actions: ① Comparison of Whirlpool's raw material cost reduction target (USD 800 million to 900 million) for North American refrigerators, washers, and dryers with Samsung's cost improvement plan; ② Detailed analysis of premium logistics and emergency procurement costs for production bases in Mexico and the US; and ③ List of candidates (local/regional suppliers) for expanding dual sourcing in North American steel, resin, and electronic components (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-03-15). References: SupplyChainDive+1, Whirlpool earnings announcement+1, Zacks+1.

thisWeek.Title: Whirlpool 비용절감
thisWeek.Summary: Whirlpool이 2023년에만 순비용을 8억달러 줄였고, 2024년에는 제조·공급망 중심 구조적 비용 절감을 3~4억달러 추가로 올리겠다고 Q4 실적 콜에서 못 박었어요fintool+1. 이 중 1억~2억달러는 공장·공급망 효율화와 복잡도 축소로 나오고, 원자재는 거의 보합이라서 순수하게 내부 생산성으로만 약 175bp의 마진 개선을 노리는 그림이에요supplychaindive+1. Whirlpool이 북미 세탁기·건조기·냉장고에서 원가 마진을 1.5~2.0%p 끌어올리면, 비슷한 스펙의 삼성 제품은 판가를 방어하지 못할 경우 연간 수백억 원대 프로모션 비용을 더 쓸 수밖에 없어서 부담이 커질 수 있어요. 그래서 삼성이 북미향 주요 BOM(강판·컴프레서·모터·레진)에 대해 원가율을 최소 1%p 이상 낮출 수 있는 조달 구조(듀얼 소싱·베트남/멕시코 현지 조달 확대)를 서둘러 설계할 필요가 있어요. 액션: ① Whirlpool Q4 2023/Q4 2024 실적 콜에서 비용절감 항목(제조·공급망 vs SG&A) 세부 정리 ② 북미 세탁기·건조기·냉장고 기준 삼성 vs Whirlpool 매출원가율·ASP·프로모션 비중 가정한 시나리오 러프 모델링 ③ 2026~2027년 북미 조달 전략(멕시코·베트남 강판/부품 듀얼소싱 로드맵) 초안 수립 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-03-05). 참고: Whirlpool실적발표+2, SupplyChainDive+1
thisWeek.Summary_en: Whirlpool cut its net costs by $800 million in 2023 alone, and pledged to achieve an additional $300 million to $400 million in structural cost savings in 2024, driven by manufacturing and supply chain initiatives. Of that, $100 million to $200 million will come from factory and supply chain efficiency improvements and complexity reductions. With raw material costs largely flat, Whirlpool is targeting a margin improvement of about $175 basis points purely from internal productivity. (supplychaindive+1) If Whirlpool raises the cost margin of its North American washers, dryers, and refrigerators by 1.5-2.0 percentage points, Samsung products with similar specifications may face a greater burden as they may have no choice but to spend hundreds of billions of won more on promotions annually if they are unable to defend their selling prices. Therefore, Samsung needs to quickly design a procurement structure (dual sourcing, expansion of local procurement in Vietnam/Mexico) that can lower the cost margin of major BOMs (steel plates, compressors, motors, and resins) for North America by at least 1 percentage point. Actions: ① Detailed summary of cost-saving items (manufacturing/supply chain vs. SG&A) from Whirlpool's Q4 2023/Q4 2024 earnings call. ② Rough scenario modeling assuming Samsung vs. Whirlpool's cost of sales ratio, ASP, and promotional portions for North American washer/dryer/refrigerator units. ③ Draft North American procurement strategy for 2026-2027 (Mexico/Vietnam steel plate/component dual sourcing roadmap). (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-03-05). Reference: Whirlpool earnings call +2, SupplyChainDive +1

thisWeek.Title: Haier 조달 디지털화
thisWeek.Summary: Haier가 2024년 연간 매출 2,859.8억위안에 27.8% 총마진(전년 대비 +0.3%p)을 기록했는데, 보고서에서 이를 글로벌 통합 조달·현지 생산 최적화 덕분이라고 강조했어요ircenter.handelsblatt+1. 중국 정저우의 공동 컴프레서 공장은 연간 224만대, 정저우·충칭 PCB 공장은 합산 530만개를 자체 생산하면서 핵심 부품 내재화로 원가와 리스크를 같이 줄이고 있고, 유럽·중동·동남아에 분산된 130개 이상 공장·거점을 활용해 물류비도 낮추고 있어요ircenter.handelsblatt+1. 이렇게 Haier가 컴프레서·PCB 같은 핵심 부품을 내재화·현지화하면서 원가 구조를 개선하면, 삼성은 동일 부품을 외부에서 조달하는 한 최소 0.3%p 이상 원가율 격차를 계속 안고 갈 수 있어요. 삼성 입장에서는 중국·베트남에서 컴프레서·PCB를 공급하는 현 협력사들의 기술·가격 경쟁력을 재점검하고, 일부는 합작·지분투자 방식으로 내재화 수준까지 끌어올리는 벤치마크가 필요해 보여요. 액션: ① Haier 2024 연차·반기 보고서에서 부품 내제화(컴프레서·PCB 등) 투자·생산능력·조달 정책 부분 정리 ② 삼성 냉장고·세탁기에서 동일 부품(컴프레서·PCB) 외부 조달 비중 vs Haier 내제화 비중 비교 분석 ③ 컴프레서·PCB 기준 JV/장기계약/기술제휴 후보사(중국·베트남) 숏리스트 작성 및 1차 타진 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-03-15). 참고: Haier연차보고서+1, Haier유럽현지화기사+1
thisWeek.Summary_en: Haier recorded annual sales of 285.98 billion yuan in 2024 and a gross margin of 27.8% (+0.3 percentage points year-on-year), which the report emphasized as a result of global integrated procurement and local production optimization ircenter.handelsblatt+1. The joint compressor factory in Zhengzhou, China, produces 2.24 million units annually, and the Zhengzhou-Chongqing PCB factories produce a combined 5.3 million units, reducing both costs and risks by internalizing key components. In addition, the company is lowering logistics costs by utilizing more than 130 factories and bases spread across Europe, the Middle East, and Southeast Asia ircenter.handelsblatt+1. If Haier improves its cost structure by internalizing and localizing core components such as compressors and PCBs, Samsung will be able to continue to have a cost rate gap of at least 0.3%p as long as it procures the same components externally. From Samsung's perspective, it seems necessary to re-examine the technological and price competitiveness of its current partners that supply compressors and PCBs in China and Vietnam, and to set a benchmark by raising some of them to the level of internalization through joint ventures or equity investments. Actions: ① Summary of investment, production capacity, and procurement policies for internalizing components (compressors, PCBs, etc.) in Haier's 2024 annual and semi-annual reports. ② Comparative analysis of the proportion of external procurement of the same components (compressors, PCBs) in Samsung refrigerators and washing machines vs. the proportion of internalization by Haier. ③ Shortlist and first-round sounding of candidates (China and Vietnam) for joint ventures/long-term contracts/technical alliances based on compressors and PCBs (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-03-15). References: Haier Annual Report +1, Haier European Localization Article +1

thisWeek.Title: Haier 인도 현지화
thisWeek.Summary: 인도 법인에서 Haier가 냉장고·에어컨 부품을 70~80% 수준까지 현지화하고, 에어컨 공장과 PCB 생산라인에 Rs 800 crore 규모 투자를 진행하면서 수입 의존도를 낮추고 있어요.economictimes.indiatimes+2 이 투자로 인도 에어컨 생산능력이 연 150만대→250만대로 늘고, 공급망 리드타임을 60~90일→25일 정도로 줄이겠다는 계획이라서, 부품 부족·운임 급등 같은 외부 충격에 대한 방어력이 커지고 있어요.economictimes.indiatimes​ 인도에서 이렇게 원자재·부품을 깊게 현지화하면 중장기적으로 Haier가 인도·인근 시장에서 물류·관세 부담이 훨씬 적은 구조를 갖게 돼서, 삼성 인도 생산거점과의 원가·공급망 리스크 격차가 벌어질 수 있어요. 벤치마크 관점에서는 우리도 인도/남아시아에서 세탁기·냉장고의 현지 부품 비중(특히 PCB·플라스틱·열교환기)을 다시 점검하고, Haier 공급망에 들어간 로컬 업체 중 삼성도 쓸 수 있는 후보를 미리 발굴하는 게 좋겠어요. 액션: ① 인도 가전 시장에서 Haier 현지화 투자 내역(AC 250만대, PCB, 사출 등)과 삼성 인도 법인 투자·현지화 수준 비교 ② 인도·동남아 로컬 부품사(PCB, 플라스틱, 열교환기)에 대한 품질/원가 사전 실사 리스트 작성 ③ 향후 인도/남아시아 조달 전략에서 ‘관세·운임 리스크 시나리오’별 생산·조달 배분 재시뮬레이션 (우선순위: 중, 기한: 2026-03-31). 참고: EconomicTimes+2, ProjectsToday+1
thisWeek.Summary_en: Haier is reducing its dependence on imports by localizing refrigerator and air conditioner parts to 70-80% and investing Rs 800 crore in air conditioner factories and PCB production lines. economictimes.indiatimes+2 With this investment, the annual air conditioner production capacity in India will increase from 1.5 million units to 2.5 million units and the supply chain lead time will be reduced from 60-90 days to 25 days, increasing its defense against external shocks such as parts shortages and sharp increases in freight rates. economictimes.indiatimes​ If Haier deeply localizes raw materials and parts in India, it will have a structure with much lower logistics and tariff burdens in India and neighboring markets in the mid- to long-term, which could widen the cost and supply chain risk gap with Samsung's Indian production base. From a benchmark perspective, we are also planning to increase our production capacity in India/South Asia. It would be wise to re-evaluate the proportion of local components in washing machines and refrigerators (especially PCBs, plastics, and heat exchangers) and proactively identify potential candidates among local suppliers within Haier's supply chain that Samsung can leverage. Actions: ① Compare Haier's localization investments in the Indian home appliance market (2.5 million AC units, PCBs, injection molding, etc.) with Samsung's Indian subsidiary's investment and localization levels. ② Create a list of pre-qualification/cost due diligence checks on local component suppliers in India and Southeast Asia (PCBs, plastics, heat exchangers). ③ Re-simulate production and procurement allocations based on "tariff and freight risk scenarios" in future India/South Asia procurement strategies. (Priority: Medium, Deadline: 2026-03-31) References: EconomicTimes+2, ProjectsToday+1

lastWeek.Title: LG 인도 현지화 가속
lastWeek.Summary: LG가 인도 예산 2026에서 전자부품 제조 지원 예산을 ₹22,919 crore→₹40,000 crore로 키우면서, 인도 생산 부품 현지화율 55.8%→70%+를 목표로 잡았대요. 인도 법인은 압축기·모터·디스플레이 패널 같은 핵심 부품까지 현지 생산/조달을 늘려 수입 의존도를 줄이고, 환율·물류 리스크를 줄이려는 그림이에요. 동시에 Seoul Economic Daily 분석에 따르면 본사는 인력 효율화에 4,000억 원을 쓰고 연간 1,300~2,000억 원 고정비를 줄이면서, 저코스트 국가 생산·원자재 조달 비중을 키우고 미국 현지 생산 비중을 60%까지 올려 관세 부담도 줄이려 하고 있어요. 인도와 동남아에서 압축기·모터·패널까지 LG가 현지화에 성공하면, 중기적으로 인도·ME/아프리카향 냉장고·세탁기·에어컨에서 삼성의 BOM 단가 경쟁력이 구조적으로 불리해질 수 있어서 조달 구조 재점검이 꽤 시급해 보여요. 삼성 입장에선 같은 인도 시장에서 현지 부품 비중이 낮으면 물류·관세·환율까지 합친 총원가에서 밀리기 쉬워요. 그래서 액션은 이렇게 가면 좋아요: ① LG 인도 법인/현지 협력사 기준 부품(압축기·모터·디스플레이) 공급선 리스트 업데이트 ② 인도·동남아 생산 거점별(폴란드·베트남 포함) 동일 사양 기준 부품 원가 비교 테이블 재작성 ③ 삼성 인도향 생활가전(냉장고·세탁기·에어컨)에서 2026~2027년까지 달성해야 할 현지 조달 비중 목표 세팅 및 협력사 발굴 플랜 수립 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-25). 참고: Multibagg+1, SeoulEconomicDaily+1, ChosunDaily+1
lastWeek.Summary_en: LG has set a target of increasing the budget for supporting electronic component manufacturing in the 2026 Indian Budget from ₹22,919 crore to ₹40,000 crore, and raising the localization rate of parts for Indian production from 55.8% to 70%+. The Indian subsidiary is planning to reduce dependence on imports and reduce exchange rate and logistics risks by increasing local production/sourcing of core components such as compressors, motors, and display panels. At the same time, according to an analysis by Seoul Economic Daily, the headquarters is spending 400 billion won on improving human resources, reducing annual fixed costs by 130-200 billion won, increasing the proportion of production and raw material procurement from low-cost countries, and raising the proportion of local production in the US to 60% to reduce the tariff burden. If LG succeeds in localizing compressors, motors, and panels in India and Southeast Asia, Samsung's BOM unit price competitiveness in refrigerators, washing machines, and air conditioners for India, ME, and Africa may become structurally disadvantaged in the medium term, so it seems quite urgent to reexamine the procurement structure. From Samsung's perspective, if the proportion of local parts is low in the same Indian market, it is easy to fall behind in the total cost including logistics, tariffs, and exchange rates. So, the actions should go like this: ① Update the list of suppliers for parts (compressors, motors, and displays) based on LG India corporations/local partners ② Re-create the cost comparison table for parts based on the same specifications by production base in India and Southeast Asia (including Poland and Vietnam) ③ Set the target for the proportion of local procurement to be achieved by 2026-2027 for Samsung's home appliances for India (refrigerators, washing machines, and air conditioners) and establish a plan to discover partners (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-25). Reference: Multibagg+1, SeoulEconomicDaily+1, ChosunDaily+1

lastWeek.Title: Whirlpool 원가절감
lastWeek.Summary: Whirlpool이 2025년 한 해에 구조적 비용 절감 2억달러를 실행하고도 관세 부담 속에서 연간 EBIT 마진 4.7%를 유지했다고 실적 발표와 컨퍼런스콜에서 밝혔어요. 하지만 2025년 한 해에만 부품·완제품에 걸쳐 관세 비용 약 3억달러를 흡수했고, 2026년에 추가 1억5,000만달러+ 규모의 비용 절감 액션을 북미 중심으로 더 추진하겠다고 해서, 북미 생산·소싱 쪽 체질 개선을 계속 드라이브하는 그림이에요. 관세·프로모션 압박이 큰데도 Whirlpool이 고정비·소싱 구조를 공격적으로 재편하고 있어서, 북미 세탁기·건조기·냉장고 시장에서 단순 가격 인상만으로는 삼성의 원가 우위를 방어하기가 점점 어려워질 수 있어요. 삼성 관점에선 북미 MDA(세탁기·건조기·냉장고) 기준으로 Whirlpool의 COGS/매출 구조와 재료비·관세 항목을 라인별로 뜯어보지 않으면, 향후 1~2년간 ASP 인하 싸움에서 뒤늦게 대응하게 될 위험이 있어요. 그래서 액션은 ① Whirlpool 2025년 IR·Press Release·10-K에서 제품군별 매출원가(COGS)·관세 영향 수치 정리 ② 북미 세탁기·건조기 기준 Whirlpool vs 삼성의 재료비/제조경비 구조 비교 테이블 작성 ③ 2026~2027년 북미 주요 철강·플라스틱·전자부품 공급사별 재료비 인하·리베이트 목표 세팅 및 LTA 개편안 초안 수립 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-02-28). 참고: WhirlpoolIR+1, FintoolTranscript+1, Ainvest+1
lastWeek.Summary_en: Whirlpool announced in its earnings release and conference call that it would maintain an annual 4.7% EBIT margin despite implementing structural cost savings of $200 million in 2025 alone and the burden of tariffs. However, in 2025 alone, it absorbed approximately $300 million in tariff costs across parts and finished products, and announced that it would pursue additional $150 million+ cost-saving actions in 2026, centered on North America, indicating that it is continuing to drive structural improvements in North American production and sourcing. Despite the significant pressure from tariffs and promotions, Whirlpool is aggressively restructuring its fixed costs and sourcing structure, making it increasingly difficult for Samsung to defend its cost advantage in the North American washer, dryer, and refrigerator market simply by raising prices. From Samsung's perspective, if it doesn't analyze Whirlpool's COGS/sales structure and material costs/tariff items by line based on the North American MDA (washer, dryer, and refrigerator), there is a risk that it will respond late in the fight to lower ASPs over the next 1-2 years. Therefore, the actions are as follows: ① Compile cost of goods sold (COGS) and tariff impact figures by product group from Whirlpool's 2025 IR, Press Release, and 10-K; ② Create a table comparing the material cost/manufacturing overhead structure of Whirlpool vs. Samsung for North American washers and dryers; and ③ Set material cost reduction and rebate targets for major North American steel, plastic, and electronic component suppliers for 2026-2027 and draft a LTA reform plan. (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-02-28) References: WhirlpoolIR+1, FintoolTranscript+1, Ainvest+1

lastWeek.Title: Gree 구리비용 압박
lastWeek.Summary: Gree가 구리 가격이 톤당 10만위안 수준까지 오른 상황에서도 에어컨 소비자 가격을 올리지 않고, 에어컨 원가의 약 40%를 차지하는 구리 배관·열교환기를 그대로 쓰겠다고 밝힌 뉴스가 나왔어요. 중국 내 다른 에어컨 업체들은 구리 급등 때문에 가격을 2~5% 올리고, 알루미늄 열교환기를 써서 최대 20% 저렴한 알루미늄 에어컨도 내놓는 흐름인데, Gree는 브랜드·신뢰성 이미지를 위해 알루미늄 전환을 서두르지 않겠다는 스탠스를 유지하고 있어요. 기사에 따르면 구리 가격이 톤당 10만위안, 알루미늄은 2만2,000위안 수준이고 필요한 중량도 알루미늄이 구리의 60% 정도라 이론상 원가 절감 여지는 크지만, 수명·신뢰성 이슈 때문에 업계가 속도를 조절하는 분위기래요. 구리 가격이 이렇게 오른 상태가 길어지면 삼성도 압축기·열교환기용 구리 소재 조달 단가가 같이 오르기 때문에, 어느 수준까지 알루미늄·복합소재를 쓸지 기술·원가 시나리오를 서둘러 그려두는 게 필수인 타이밍이에요. 삼성 입장에서는 중국·글로벌 구리 가격이 계속 고공행진하면 냉장고·에어컨·히트펌프 쪽 재료비 비중이 더 튀어 오를 수 있어요. 그래서 액션은 ① 광주·천안·중국 생산법인의 구리 사용량/원가 민감도(톤당 가격 변화 대비 제품 원가 영향) 재산정 ② 알루미늄 열교환기·튜브 적용 시 성능·수명 영향에 대한 사내·협력사 시험 데이터 리뷰 및 적용 가능한 제품군 선별 ③ 2026년 구리/알루미늄 LTA(장기계약) 전략 및 가격 헤지 정책(선물·옵션 포함) 초안 수립 (우선순위: 상, 기한: 2026-03-15). 참고: Yicai+1, Longbridge+1, NextGenInvestors+1
lastWeek.Summary_en: Gree announced that it will not raise the consumer price of its air conditioners even as the price of copper soars to 100,000 yuan per ton, and will continue to use copper piping and heat exchangers, which account for about 40% of the air conditioner cost, according to news reports. Other air conditioner companies in China are raising their prices by 2-5% due to the surge in copper and releasing aluminum air conditioners that are up to 20% cheaper by using aluminum heat exchangers, but Gree is maintaining its stance of not rushing to switch to aluminum for the sake of its brand and reliability image. According to the article, the price of copper is 100,000 yuan per ton, aluminum is around 22,000 yuan, and aluminum requires about 60% of the weight of copper, so in theory there is a lot of room for cost reduction, but the industry is said to be slowing down due to lifespan and reliability issues. If the rise in copper prices continues like this, Samsung's unit cost of procuring copper materials for compressors and heat exchangers will also increase, so it is essential to quickly draw up a technology and cost scenario for how much aluminum and composite materials to use. From Samsung's perspective, if Chinese and global copper prices continue to soar, the proportion of material costs for refrigerators, air conditioners, and heat pumps may jump further. Therefore, the actions are ① re-evaluate the copper usage/cost sensitivity (product cost impact compared to price change per ton) of the Gwangju, Cheonan, and Chinese production corporations ② Review in-house and partner test data on the impact on performance and lifespan when applying aluminum heat exchangers and tubes and select applicable product groups ③ Draft a copper/aluminum LTA (long-term agreement) strategy and price hedging policy (including futures and options) for 2026 (Priority: High, Deadline: 2026-03-15). References: Yicai+1, Longbridge+1, NextGenInvestors+1
